title: Looking at animals: cattle
creator_credit: Peter Boulton, Educational Foundation for Visual Aids and Boulton-Hawker Films
brief_description: Illustrates the wide variety of cattle: domestic breeds; including exotic varieties - draught oxen, yaks, wild bison and buffalo. Shows the easily domesticated nature of cattle, their main physical characteristics, and the process of rumination. Includes a sequence showing the birth of a calf.
